aap_form_input.create: CREATE TABLE `aap_form_input` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'form input id', `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL COMMENT 'form input name', `uniqkey` varchar(128) NOT NULL COMMENT 'unique key', `display` varchar(512) NOT NULL COMMENT 'the label of this input', `pname` varchar(128) NOT NULL COMMENT 'the parameter name of the input', `help_message` varchar(4096) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'help message of the input', `default` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'default value', `assignedAttrs` text NOT NULL COMMENT 'additional attributes assigned by the user, a json string', `form_input_type` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT 'type of the input', `detail` text NOT NULL COMMENT 'the detail configuration of this input, a json string', `op_user` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'UNKNOWN_USER' COMMENT 'user that last modifies this form input', `ctime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'create timestamp', `mtime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'last modify timestamp', `ext` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'for future use', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uniqkey` (`uniqkey`), KEY `name` (`name`), KEY `form_input_type` (`form_input_type`), KEY `pname` (`pname`), KEY `ctime` (`ctime`), KEY `mtime` (`mtime`), KEY `op_user` (`op_user`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=81 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='save form input records';

aap_item.insert: INSERT INTO `aap_item` VALUES (1,'页面管理-添加页面','pa-ap','form','添加页面','','{\"form\": \"add_page\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(2,'页面管理-页面列表','pa-pl','page','页面列表','','{\"page\": \"page_admin\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(3,'Header管理-添加Header','ha-ah','form','添加Header','','{\"form\": \"add_header\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(4,'Header管理-Header列表','ha-hl','page','Header列表','','{\"page\": \"header_admin\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(5,'Lefter管理-添加Lefter','la-al','form','添加Lefter','','{\"form\": \"add_lefter\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(6,'Lefter管理-Lefter列表','la-ll','page','Lefter列表','','{\"page\": \"lefter_admin\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(7,'Item管理-添加Item','ia-ai','form','添加Item','','{\"form\": \"add_item\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(8,'Item管理-Item列表','ia-il','page','Item列表','','{\"page\": \"item_admin\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(9,'Form管理-添加Form','fa-af','form','添加表单','','{\"form\": \"add_form\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(10,'Form管理-Form列表','fa-fl','page','表单列表','','{\"page\": \"form_admin\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(11,'Form Input管理-添加Form Input','fia-afi','form','添加表单输入','','{\"form\": \"add_form_input\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(12,'Form Input管理-Form Input列表','fia-fil','page','表单输入列表','','{\"page\": \"form_input_admin\"}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,'');
aap_item.create: CREATE TABLE `aap_item` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'item id', `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL COMMENT 'item record name', `uniqkey` varchar(128) NOT NULL COMMENT 'unique key', `item_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT 'page for jumping to an aap page, form for opening a form, hyperlink for jumping to an external page', `display` varchar(512) NOT NULL COMMENT 'the display content of this item', `icon` varchar(4096) NOT NULL COMMENT 'icon type, see: http://ant.design/components/icon', `detail` text NOT NULL COMMENT 'the detail configuration of this item, a json string', `op_user` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'UNKNOWN_USER' COMMENT 'user that last modifies this record', `ctime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'create timestamp', `mtime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'last modifies timestamp', `ext` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'for future use', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `name` (`name`), KEY `item_type` (`item_type`), KEY `ctime` (`ctime`), KEY `mtime` (`mtime`), KEY `op_user` (`op_user`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=13 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='save item records';

aap_header.insert: INSERT INTO `aap_header` VALUES (1,'后台主Header','amh','{\"item\": [\"pa-pl\", \"ha-hl\", \"la-ll\", \"ia-il\", \"fa-fl\", \"fia-fil\"]}','xuruiqi',1476535676,1476535676,''),(2,'后台二级Header','ash','{}','xuruiqi',1476535676,1476535676,'');
aap_header.create: CREATE TABLE `aap_header` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'header id', `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL COMMENT 'header record name', `uniqkey` varchar(128) NOT NULL COMMENT 'unique key', `components` text NOT NULL COMMENT 'header components, a json string', `op_user` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'UNKNOWN_USER' COMMENT 'user that last modifies this record', `ctime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'create timestamp', `mtime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'last modify timestamp', `ext` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'for future use', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uniqkey` (`uniqkey`), KEY `name` (`name`), KEY `ctime` (`ctime`), KEY `mtime` (`mtime`), KEY `op_user` (`op_user`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='save header records';

aap_form.insert: INSERT INTO `aap_form` VALUES (1,'添加页面','add_page','/api/page/add_page','application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8','{\"form_input\": [\"n-n\", \"p-name\", \"p-title\", \"fi-urlmark\", \"p-comp\", \"p-ct\", \"n-opu\", \"n-ext\"]}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(2,'添加Header','add_header','/api/header/add_header','application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8','{\"form_input\": [\"n-n\", \"h-name\", \"fi-uniqkey\", \"h-comp\", \"n-opu\", \"n-ext\"]}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(3,'添加Lefter','add_lefter','/api/lefter/add_lefter','application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8','{\"form_input\": [\"n-n\", \"l-name\", \"fi-uniqkey\", \"l-comp\", \"n-opu\", \"n-ext\"]}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(4,'添加Item','add_item','/api/item/add_item','application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8','{\"form_input\": [\"n-n\", \"i-name\", \"fi-uniqkey\", \"fi-disp\", \"i-itype\", \"i-jtype\", \"n-opu\", \"n-ext\"]}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(5,'添加表单','add_form','/api/form/add_form','application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8','{\"form_input\": [\"n-n\", \"f-name\", \"f-papi\", \"fi-urlmark\", \"f-submittype\", \"f-comp\", \"n-opu\", \"n-ext\"]}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,''),(6,'添加表单输入','add_form_input','/api/form_input/add_form_input','application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8','{\"form_input\": [\"n-n\", \"fi-name\", \"fi-uniqkey\", \"fi-disp\", \"fi-help\", \"fi-default\", \"fi-pkey\", \"fi-itype\", \"fi-rhattrs\", \"n-opu\", \"n-ext\"]}','xuruiqi',1476535677,1476535677,'');
aap_form.create: CREATE TABLE `aap_form` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'form id', `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL COMMENT 'form record name', `urlmark` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'what to display in page part in the url', `post_api` varchar(4096) NOT NULL COMMENT 'which url to post to when the form submits', `content_type` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8' COMMENT 'content type of the post data', `components` text NOT NULL COMMENT 'form components, a json string', `op_user` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'UNKNOWN_USER' COMMENT 'user that last modifies this record', `ctime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'create timestamp', `mtime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'last modify timestamp', `ext` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'for future use', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `urlmark` (`urlmark`), KEY `name` (`name`), KEY `ctime` (`ctime`), KEY `mtime` (`mtime`), KEY `op_user` (`op_user`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='save form records';

aap_lefter.create: CREATE TABLE `aap_lefter` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'lefter id', `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL COMMENT 'lefter record name', `uniqkey` varchar(128) NOT NULL COMMENT 'unique key', `components` text NOT NULL COMMENT 'lefter components, a json string', `op_user` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'UNKNOWN_USER' COMMENT 'user the last modifies this record', `ctime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'create timestamp', `mtime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'last modify timestamp', `ext` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'for future use', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uniqkey` (`uniqkey`), KEY `name` (`name`), KEY `op_user` (`op_user`), KEY `ctime` (`ctime`), KEY `mtime` (`mtime`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='save lefter records';

aap_page.create: CREATE TABLE `aap_page` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'page id', `name` varchar(256) NOT NULL COMMENT 'page record name', `title` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Unknown Page' COMMENT 'title of the page', `urlmark` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'what to display in page part in the url', `components` text NOT NULL COMMENT 'components of page, a json string', `content` text NOT NULL COMMENT 'content of page, a json string', `page_type` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '1 for normal pages，2 for aap pages', `op_user` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'UNKNOWN_USER' COMMENT 'user that last modifies this record', `ctime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'create timestamp', `mtime` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'last modify timestamp', `ext` varchar(1024) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'for future use', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `urlmark` (`urlmark`), KEY `name` (`name`), KEY `page_type` (`page_type`), KEY `ctime` (`ctime`), KEY `mtime` (`mtime`), KEY `op_user` (`op_user`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='save page records';
